episodes.title: The Strange Alleged Sex Cult That Wears All Purple
episodes.description:
The highly controversial Lafayette Morehouse community formed in Lafayette, California in 1968. The members engage in experimental sexual research and believe in a life of hedonistic pleasure. Their members also teach classes on sex practices and techniques, and the group even used to offer college degrees in those areas, in case you were having trouble deciding what to major in!

To read more about this wild Cali cult, go here:
https://www.ranker.com/list/facts-about-purple-people-cult/anna-lindwasser
Be sure to subscribe to the Weird History Newsletter: https://www.ranker.com/newsletters/weird-history?utm_source=Youtube&utm_medium=WeirdHistory&utm_campaign=WHnewsletters&utm_content=description_box

#california  #cult #weirdhistory
